author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND ERNESTO IS STRENGTHENING... ...HURRICANE WATCH IN EFFECT FOR BERMUDA...
summary:
...AIR FORCE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND ERNESTO IS STRENGTHENING... ...HURRICANE WATCH IN EFFECT FOR BERMUDA...
 As of 8:00 PM AST Wed Aug 14
 the center of Ernesto was located near 22.4, -68.7
 with movement NW at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 981 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.
